content: Dragon Tiger Wild features an exciting new WILD CARD bonus! Unlock greater winning potential of up to 157x! Predict the highest card and Wild combinations for spectacular rewards! LET’S GET WILD!!!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: The game is played with three cards: 2 main cards (Dragon and Tiger) competing for the highest value, and 1 Wild Card to form bonus combinations
Betting options: Main Bets (Dragon/Tiger/Tie) or Wild Bets (Dragon Pair, Tiger Pair, Dragon Wild, Tiger Wild, Super Wild).

slide-3.title: Wild Bonus
content: The Wild Card boosts winnings up to 127x through special combinations!
Place bets on Wild combinations and win MULTIPLIED BONUSES!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph-1: Dragon Tiger Wild is the latest game from IDNLIVE EUROPE, offering even more excitement with the addition of a Wild Card. This game provides a fresh experience for Dragon Tiger enthusiasts, with fantastic winning potential of up to 127x! LET’S GET WILD!!!
introduction.paragraph-2: The objective of this game is to predict the highest card between Dragon and Tiger while utilizing the Wild Card to create Bonus Wild combinations for even bigger payouts.

general-rules.title: General Rules
steps: The game is conducted by a dealer.
The game uses 8 decks of cards in one shoe.
At the start of each new shoe, the dealer will reveal one card to determine how many cards will be burned or discarded. A maximum of 11 cards may be burned.
After the betting time ends, the dealer draws one card as the Wild Card, then deals one card each to Dragon and Tiger.
The side with the highest card value wins. The highest value is K, which equals 13.
If the result is a tie, Dragon and Tiger bets are refunded by half. The Tie bet wins only if Dragon and Tiger have the same value.
In 50-50 bets like Dragon/Tiger, you can only choose one side per round. If you bet on Dragon, you cannot bet on Tiger in the same round.

dragon-tiger-wild-card.title: Dragon Tiger Wild Card

wild-bet.title: Wild Bets
wild-bet.description: As mentioned in the introduction, Dragon Tiger Wild introduces new gameplay elements and exciting bonuses. Here’s how it works:
wild-bet.description-2: The Wild Card determines winnings with higher payouts than regular bets. There are 5 types of Wild Bets:
wild-bet.dragon-wild: This bet pays if the Dragon Card wins and has the same value as the Wild Card.
wild-bet.tiger-wild: This bet pays if the Tiger Card wins and has the same value as the Wild Card.
wild-bet.super-wild: This bet pays if all three cards—Wild Card, Dragon Card, and Tiger Card—have the same value.
wild-bet.dragon-pair: This bet pays if the Dragon Card and Wild Card have the same value (Dragon Card does not have to win).
wild-bet.tiger-pair: This bet pays if the Tiger Card and Wild Card have the same value (Tiger Card does not have to win).

dragon.title: Dragon
dragon.description: Pays if the Dragon card value is higher than the Tiger card value.

tiger.title: Tiger
tiger.description: Pays if the Tiger card value is higher than the Dragon card value.

tie.title: Tie
tie.description: Pays if the Dragon and Tiger cards have the same value.

dragon-wild.title: Dragon Wild
dragon-wild.description: Pays if the Dragon side wins and both the Dragon card and Wild Card have the same value.

tiger-wild.title: Tiger Wild
tiger-wild.description: Pays if the Tiger side wins and both the Tiger card and Wild Card have the same value.

super-wild.title: Super Wild
super-wild.description: Pays if the Dragon, Tiger, and Wild Cards all have the same value.

dragon-pair.title: Dragon Pair
dragon-pair.description: Pays if the Dragon card and Wild Card have the same value.

tiger-pair.title: Tiger Pair
tiger-pair.description: Pays if the Tiger card and Wild Card have the same value.
